entry.title: Review: Zero to Ruby course
entry.summary:
Yesterday, I had a wonderful time in my free Ruby course(Zero to Ruby). There were about 20 participants, and some are having some experiences in Ruby, but some are not. The course started 9:00 to 16:30, so it took about 8 hrs 30 mins.
The course started

entry.title: Zero to Ruby (free course)
entry.summary: Being a part of Ruby communities, it would be nice to do something interesting, useful, sharing to the communities. So that I decide to run Zero to Ruby(a full day free Ruby course) to help to build and grow local Ruby communities in Cambodia. There are
